00029 class FileFormat
00030 {
00031 protected:
00037     static bool hasOrTell( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &name, const util::PropertyMap &object, LogLevel level );
00043     template<typename TYPE> static bool
00044     transformOrTell( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &from, const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &to, util::PropertyMap &object, LogLevel level ) {
00045         if ( hasOrTell( from, object, level ) and object.transform<TYPE>( from, to ) ) {
00046             LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Transformed " << from << " into " << object.propertyValue( to );
00047             return true;
00048         }
00049 
00050         return false;
00051     }
00053     virtual std::string suffixes()const = 0;
00054     static const float invalid_float;
00055 public:
00056     static void throwGenericError( std::string desc );
00057     static void throwSystemError( int err, std::string desc = "" );
00058     boost::filesystem::path plugin_file;
00059 
00061     virtual std::pair<std::string, std::string> makeBasename( const std::string &filename )const;
00062 
00063     static std::string makeFilename(const util::PropertyMap &img,std::string namePattern);
00064     std::list<std::string> makeUniqueFilenames( const std::list<data::Image> &images, const std::string &namePattern )const;
00065 
00066 
00068     virtual std::string getName()const = 0;
00069 
00077     std::list<util::istring> getSuffixes()const;
00078 
00079 
00081     virtual std::string dialects( const std::string &/*filename*/ )const {return std::string();};
00082 
00084     virtual bool tainted()const {return true;}
00085 
00094     virtual int load( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect ) throw( std::runtime_error & ) = 0; //@todo should be locked
00095 
00102     virtual void write( const data::Image &image, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect ) throw( std::runtime_error & ) = 0;
00103 
00111     virtual void write( const std::list<data::Image> &images, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect ) throw( std::runtime_error & );
00112 
00113     virtual ~FileFormat() {}
